p.line: The block tries to find the smallest item of a non-empty number list.
It works if the items are sorted in descending order, biggest to smallest
It only works when the first element (which we'll call the "head") is smallest, otherwise it won't report the correct answer
It works when the first element smaller than the head is the smallest element

content.hint: It works when it is OKAY to report the result once we find someone smaller than the head.
